metadata.subject: Abandoned quarries
Quarries and quarrying
Fines (Penalties)
metadata.title: Ordonnance de M. le lieutenant général de police, qui interdit l'usage de carrieres exploitées sans permission au territoire de Montesson, par les nommés Dreux, Nicolle, Chatelier & autres, & qui les condamne en l'amende, & à détruire des cavages dangereux & abandonnés : du 27 juin 1781
metadata.creator: Paris (France). Lieutenant général de police
Paris (France). Lieutenant général de police
Lenoir, Jean-Charles-Pierre, 1732-1807
Simon, P. G. (Pierre-Guillaume), 1722-1787, publisher
metadata.publisher: A Paris : Chez P.G. Simon, imprimeur du Parlement, rue Mignon Saint André-des-Arcs,
metadata.description: Not in Martin & Walter. Révolution française
metadata.notes: Title page and cover are combined. Damaged, stained, creased and/or loose pages. Uneven binding. Skewed text. No title page found. No copyright page found. No table-of-contents pages found. Text on the back cover is upside-down.
